body.p: This page contains examples of Jython scripts and script snippets that can be used with The Grinder. To use one of these scripts, you'll need to set up a grinder.properties file.
If you have a script that you would like to like to see to this page, please send it to grinder-use@lists.sf.net.

The J2EE Servlet specification defines a common model for form-based authentication. When users try to access a protected resource, they are challenged with a logon page. The logon page contains a form that POSTs username and password fields to a special j_security_check page.
